name: Heal'O'Ball
description:
This is my first ever game! Thanks to My First Game Jam 2022 for a pleasing start of my game developer journey.

Heal'O'Ball is created only after a month of my game development studies. The game is mostly made for learning purposes.

Unfortunately, I was focused on setting up physics and different game mechanics, so I didn't really had much time for level creation(even after abandoning most of creative features, due to their difficulty for my skill level).

Also optimization is missing, sorry for that.

Hope you enjoy your time playing!
